title: Warwick : clunky af
body:
Hey guys,

I wanne share some {{champion:19}}issues  with you. 

1. When i q a Champion  {{champion:19}}  stops aaing the target i qed and i cant get an aa on it. (I Think this is only when i hold q but im not quietly sure)

2. After ulting a target {{champion:19}} stops aaing 

3. When {{champion:19}} is hunting an enemy with the passive of his w and he gets slowed after the slow,  the visibilty of his Ult is strange and switches like 3 times in this second.

Thanks for reading. Reply if u agree or disagree.
@Riotteam 1 and 2 is so anoying, please change it

replies.body:
1. Deutsches Forum, du musst daher nicht englisch schreiben
2. Kein Riot-Mitarbeiter schaut in deutsche Forum (höchstens welche vom Support)
3. Da die Reichweite von Warwicks Ulti von seinen Lauftempo abhängt, ist es normal, dass sich die Reichweite ändert, wenn er verlangsamt wird.
